title: Host Your Evening With Us
description: Whether it's a birthday, product launch, intimate concert, or a curated tasting for friends and colleagues, ZANELLA Lounge offers a warm-industrial setting with hosted service and craft cocktails. We handle the details so you can focus on the moment — sound, lighting, and a menu tailored to your night.

features.text: Onsite AV options and customizable playlists

note: Interested? Reach out to discuss dates, menus, and capacity — we'll prepare a personalised proposal.

pricing.title: Pricing & Packages
pricing.description: Starting rates (RON). Final quote depends on date, guest count and any bespoke requests.

packages.name: Hourly Hire
packages.description: Pay per hour — ideal for short gatherings (min. 2 hours)

packages.name: Multi‑Hour Package (3h)
packages.description: Recommended for intimate events and tastings — includes welcome aperitivo

packages.name: Evening Hire (5h)
packages.description: Standard evening slot — semi‑private layout and dedicated host

packages.name: Full‑Day Hire (10h)
packages.description: Exclusive use, bespoke menu & staffing options

pricing.extrasNote: Extras (live music, AV, custom menu, cocktails) are quoted separately. Contact us for availability and a personalised proposal.
